tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Today ,I visited Doctor Sandhya for my daughter 's  scaling and polishing .She was very friendly and explained the problem by showing me on the monitor . Doctor also spoke to my daughter who is 11 years old but a fussy child.And my daughter felt very much at ease with Doctor Sandhya and co operated with her through out the procedure.
Doctor carried out the procedure with a lot of care and saw to it that my child was comfortable and is now willing to continue her treatment.
Thank you Doctor Sandhya .God bless you.
reply_text:
Thank you so much for your kind words 
Your child was very cooperative and we are happy to help you
We really appreciate your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Jaishree krishna. Was having unbearable pain since 2 am Sunday mng in wisdom tooth had shown Dr Sandhya y day for routine check up n small pain n she had told me will have to extract this tooth if pain persists. I had send her msg after 5 am she called me up at 7.30 am n called me 10 am to clinic so I do not suffer more now n it took her max 5 min to extract tooth n this includes giving analgesic. I had not even come to know job was done was worried as always heard this is most difficult n painful job n only heard till today **** ** * * ****** ** **** *** **** *** * **** **** **** Today mng in breakfast I got various suggestions n also name of Dr Chintamani Kelkar n others also. I do not have words to Thank Dr Sandhya today as being Sunday no one comes n that also she did not had anyone to assist her today all taken care by herself only so nice n kind of her anyone else if I had to treat I would hv been in Deep pain n sleepless another night n suffer till tomorrow evening as market time I would have also not go to see her as since suffering from 30 hours than how does another few 6 hours matter. I can say many more things but üòäüôè will pray God to always bless her.
reply_text:
Thank you for such kind words.
We really appreciate your feedback and are always happy to help you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Sabdhya is very professional and knows her job well. I took my mother to her who is a senior citizen and a cancer and diabetic patient.
Dr. Sandhya treated her like she would treat her own mom. She explained things to her and made hee understand the things that would be done to her in the root canal process which put my mother at supet ease. Its more then a year now and my mom has no dental issues.
I consulted her for my root canal too and she did a fabulous job i dont feel any difference in my tooth any more.
The best thing i loved about her that she is she does her job with a lot of passion.
Thank you for taking duch great care of us.
reply_text:
We really appreciate your feedback Shweta and are always happy to help you and your family.
Thank you for the kind words.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was going through tremendous pain from my jaw to the temple since the past 10 days.  Spoke to one of our family friend doctor, who recommended some antibiotic n pain killers which was very Temprory relief.     Was recommended Dr Sandhya by my daughter in law , who asked me to send a picture of the tooth which was paining.  Gave some medicines for two days and I was better but pain would come again.  She was the kindest human being, who opened her clinic to treat me because of my agony. Not only that she was fully equipped with Covid gear. Full suit. She explained  the procedure so simply that I felt comfortable to go ahead.  She was extremely patient with me, giving me breaks n her soothing words kept me going through all my pain.  Thank you Dr Sandhya for being such a wonderful soul   God bless you   We need more selfless doctors like you
reply_text: Thank you so much Aunty for your kind words. I'm glad your pain is relieved and you were absolutely cooperative with our protocols for covid safety!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Doctor examined my wisdom tooth and explained the extraction procedure and other things very well. satisfied with this part.  I had foretold that I have come only for opinion and not for treatment.  She took x-rays for both wisdom teeth without my prior approval that charges would apply.  I was surprised when I was charged 600/- extra for two x-rays. I did  not think it proper to deny the charge to doctor thinking it may be the general practice. *** **** * ********* *** ***** ******** ** ****** ***** **** *** **** ****** *** *** *** ****** ** *********just the visiting fee which was mentioned in their website and informed before I took the appointment.  So I wish to inform other patients when they book @ 500/-.
reply_text:
We are extremely sorry for the experience you had sir.
We believe it's wrong to comment on wisdom tooth you came to show to us without checking the x-rays and we apologise for not informing you prior as it would have skipped out unintentionally.
But if you check on website x-ray charges are clearly mentioned separately and it's not a part of consultation charges.
In fact we did consultation on your daughter's x-ray which you got with you without charging anything for that as your daughter was not present.

We still apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.

tags: None
context: Dental Cavities,Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,
review:
I feel fleeced. For such a small problem like clean up and one cavity filling was charged 6500. Friends and family told me that there are other MDS degree dentists who charge half that amount for the same job. At least if the experience was good I would still not complain, but even that was poor. 
She charges 500 for consultation but told me that she could not say or see any problem until she did scaling/clean up, which would cost 3000. I had that done *** ***** *** ******** **** * ******** Finally I said one particular tooth hurts too much please take a closer look, only then she admitted yes,there is a cavity there. 
Would not recommend.
reply_text:
Dear Amina,

We humbly apologise for any negative feelings you felt during your treatment and any inconvenience caused.

In terms of medical treatment, we showed you intra oral pictures of your teeth taken before starting any treatment. As there were deposits on the teeth we recommended you get scaling done. You confirmed this treatment plan on discussion with your mother.

Once scaling was done, with clearing of deposits, a cavity was found in your tooth, again whose pics were taken and informed to you. Again you conferred with your mother and confirmed the treatment of cavity by filling. 

We hope both these work were to your satisfaction. Also we have maintained all pre op and post op pics, we request you and your monther please visit us as per your convenience. We would like to again personally explain to your mother your treatment plan for her satisfaction.

If you want, we would like to also discuss your treatment plan and pictures of your teeth with another dentist of your choice so that you can have a second opinion.

Request you to understand that at all points before starting any treatment we reconfirmed our prices with you. You also confirmed the prices with your mother. We assure you that we maintain full transparency in our prices and we are extremely sorry you feel this way. Kindly please visit us with your mother so that we can explain our side and hope to satisfy you.

Assuring you our continued medical service for your sparkling white smile
